job.title: Associate Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtJob SummaryltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtThe primary purpose of this role is to assist with the translation of business requirements and functional specifications into code modules and software solutions This includes assisting with the implementation and maintenance of business software solutions to ensure successful deployment of released applications This role participates in all software development lifecycle phases and is critical to supporting software testing activitiesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggt Tech Stack ltstronggtPython Java Javascript and ReactltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtKey Responsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt Assists with translating business requirements and specifications into code modules and software solutions with guidance from senior colleagues provides insight into recommendations for technical solutions that meet design and functional needsltligtltligt Supports the development configuration or modification of integrated business andor enterprise application solutions within various computing environments by leveraging various software development methodologies and programming languagesltligtltligt Assists in the implementation and maintenance of business software solutions to ensure successful deployment of released applications with guidance from senior colleagues as appropriateltligtltligt Supports systems integration testing SIT and user acceptance testing UAT with guidance from senior colleagues to ensure quality software deploymentltligtltligt Supports in all software development endtoend product lifecycle phases by applying an understanding of company methodologies policies standards and controlsltligtltligt Understands Computer Science andor Computer Engineering fundamentals learning software architecture actively seeks knowledge and applies to software solutionsltligtltligt Drives the adoption of new technologies by researching innovative technical trends and developmentsltligtltligt Solves technical problems solutions may need refinement andor feedback from more senior level engineersltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtMinimum Qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt High school diploma or equivalentltligtltligt Completion of coursework or program focused on software development or related skills eg technology related college coursework boot camp certification program coding academyltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtPreferred Qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt Bachelors degree in Computer Science CIS or related fieldltligtltligt 1 year of experience in software development or a related fieldltligtltligt 1 year of experience working on projects involving the implementation of solutions applying development life cycles SDLCltligtltligt 1 year of experience in database technologiesltligtltligt 1 year of experience developing and implementing business systems within an organizationltligtltligt 1 year of experience working with defect or incident tracking softwareltligtltligt 1 year of experience writing technical documentation in a software development environmentltligtltligt 1 year of experience with Web Servicesltligtltligt Experience with application and integration middlewareltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtAbout LowesltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtLowes Companies Inc NYSE LOW is a FORTUNE 50 home improvement company serving approximately 20 million customers a week in the United States and Canada With fiscal year 2020 sales of nearly 90 billion Lowes and its related businesses operate or service more than 2200 home improvement and hardware stores and employ over 300000 associates Based in Mooresville NC Lowes supports the communities it serves through programs focused on creating safe affordable housing and helping to develop the next generation of skilled trade experts For more information visit Lowescom
